name: (2022AU-1-3) Blitz Runner
description:
Blitz Runner is a 3D parkour game all about gameplay, where you have to free run through a random environment and overcome all the obstacles in your way. The player has the ability to reach the goal by performing different movement methods. You have to move as fast as possible while jumping, sliding, wall jumping, wall running and going through slopes to achieve the lowest time possible.

Controls:

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

S - Move Backwards

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Z - Crouch

Artists: Elliot Bennett, Jonathan Saunders

Programmers:  Carlos Diaz, Jelani Cheatham

If you need to quit the game, just hit Alt and F4 to quit.

Music Creator: simple samples
